DOC.brief_title: Absorption , Distribution , Metabolism Excretion ( ADME ) Study With Single Oral Administration 14C NKTR-118
DOC.criteria: Have body mass index ( BMI ) ≥18 ≤30 kg/m2 minimum weight 50 kg Regular daily bowel movement ( ie , production least 1 stool per day ) . Nonsmoker exsmoker use tobacco nicotine product ≥3 month prior Visit 1 Healthy volunteer expose radiation level background ( eg , Xray examination ) > 5 mSv last year , > 10 mSv last 5 year , cumulative total > 1 mSv per year life Participation prior radiolabelled study within 12 month screen visit 1 Excessive intake caffeine contain drink e.g. , coffee , tea , caffeine contain energy drink cola ( 5 cup coffee equivalent per day
